name: Slingshot Explorer: The Twelve Towers
description:
Help Dr. Henry Slingshot to get the silver medallions scattered around the twelve towers plagued by numerous dangers. Making his way with his slingshot, you will be immersed in a thrilling adventure.
Video game of the old school, pixelart, compatible with keyboard and gamepads.
A difficult game, very difficult and fun. You will need hours, hours and hours to finish it, as well as a lot of skill.
Do you consider yourself skilled in the platform genre? Dare then with Slingshot Explorer: The Twelve Towers.
